member.name: M:GamesController.GetGameById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a game by its unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the game.
member.returns: The game with the specified identifier.

member.name: M:GamesController.UpdateGame(System.Int32,Game)
member.param: The unique identifier of the game to update.

member.name: M:GamesController.DeleteGame(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a game by its unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the game to delete.

member.name: M:GamesController.GetTopByPlaytime(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the most played games with optional genre and platform filters.
member.returns: A list of games with the highest total playtime.

member.name: M:GamesController.GetTopByPlayers(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the games with the highest number of unique players, with optional genre and platform filters.
member.returns: A list of games with the highest number of unique players.
